channel.title: Pages on Syniti Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Syniti Documentation

item.description: Distribution Workflow Attachment Option Use this page to Configure Workflow Options. To access this page: Select Information Steward Accelerator > Configurationfrom Navigation pane. Click the Distribution Workflow Optionsicon. Field Description PROJECT ID Displays the name of the project added in Information Steward and loaded into ISA. PROJECT DISTRIBUTION ID Displays the name of the Project Distribution to which the selected user is assigned.

Edit Workflow Templates Use this page to View and Edit All Workflow Templates From One Page. To access this page, select Information Steward Accelerator > Configuration > Edit Workflow Templatesin the Navigation pane.

Parameters Use this page to: Configure Workflow Templates at the Parameter Level Set Parameters To access this page, select Information Steward Accelerator > Configuration > Parametersin Navigation pane. This page has the following tabs: General Basic Settings Information Steward Settings Attachment Settings Summary Settings General Basic Settings Information Steward Settings Attachment Settings Field Description Attachment Subject Displays the text that appears in the subject line of the workflow email for users who have the Send Attachments WORKFLOW OPTION set on the Users page.

Log Use this page to View ISA Log. To access this page: Select Information Steward Accelerator >Advanced > Logfrom the Navigation pane. OR Select Information Steward Accelerator >Configuration > Parameters > Basic Settings > Logfrom the Navigation pane. Field Description Clear Log Click to clear the log. ID Displays the ID of the log message. DATE DisplaysÂ the date of the message.

Metric Summary H Metric Summary VUse this page to Download ISA Metrics Summary Information. To access this page, select Information Steward Accelerator >Advanced > Metric Summary in the Navigation pane. NOTE:The rules that display on this page depend on how the page is accessed. If this page is accessed when a user drills down through the Total Opportunities vs Failures Summary dashboard or the Failure Percentage Summary dashboard, the rules and all rule bindings for the selected rule display.

Project Distribution Attribute Values Use this page to Assign Project Distribution Rules using Custom Attributes. To access this page: Click Information Steward Accelerator > Project Summaryin the Navigation pane. Click Distributionsfor a project. Click Custom Attributesfor a distribution. Click Valuesfor a rule. Field Descriptions PROJECT Display the project name that contains the selected project distribution. ATTRIBUTE Displays the name of the attribute as added in IS.

Project Distribution Attribute Value Rules Use this page to Assign Project Distribution Rules using Custom Attributes. To access this page: Click Information Steward Accelerator > Project Summary in the Navigation pane. Click Distributionsfor a project. Click Custom Attributesfor a distribution. Click Valuesfor a rule. Click Rule Count. Field Descriptions Add Click to add the selected rule to the project distribution.

Project Distribution Attributes Use this page to Assign Project Distribution Rules using Custom Attributes. To access this page: Click Information Steward Accelerator > Project Summaryin the Navigation pane. Click Distributionsfor a project. Click Custom Attributesfor a distribution. Field Descriptions PROJECT Display the project name that contains the selected project distribution. ATTRIBUTE Displays the name of the attribute as added in IS.

Project Distribution Filters Use this page to Configure Project Distribution Filters. To access this page: Select Information Steward Accelerator > Project Summaryfrom Navigation pane. Click Distributionsfor a project. Click Filtersfor a distribution. Field Description PROJECT DISTRIBUTION ID Displays the distribution name that contains the filter. FIELD Displays the name of the field that will be filtered.

Project Distribution Reports Use this page to View Reports for Project Distributions. To access this page: Click Information Steward Accelerator > Report Data Viewerin Navigation pane. Click Reportsfor a project distribution.

Project Distribution Rule Bindings Use this page to: View Rule Bindings Deactivate Columns for Project Distribution Rule Bindings Edit Rule Binding Descriptions, Implication and Recommendation To access this page: Click Information Steward Accelerator > Project Summaryin the Navigation pane. Click Distributionsfor a project. Click Rulesfor a distribution. Click Bindingsfor a rule.

Project Distribution Rules Use this page to Add Rules to a Project Distribution To access this page: Click Information Steward Accelerator > Project Summaryin the Navigation pane. Click Distributionsfor a project. Click Rulesfor a distribution. Field Description RULE ID Displays the name of the rule created in IS that will be run for the project Distribution. All rules created in IS with a rule status of Approved are available to be selected, regardless of the project.

Project Distribution User Filters Use this page to set user filters at the project distribution level. To access this page: Select Project Summary in the Navigation pane. Click the Distributions icon for a project. Click the User icon for a project distribution. Click the Filters icon for a user. Field Description FIELD Displays the name of the field that will be filtered for the project distribution.

Project Distribution Users Use this page to Add Users to a Project Distribution. To access this page: Select Information Steward Accelerator > Project Summary in the Navigation pane. Click the Usersicon. NOTE:Excel Integration has been enabled on this page. Refer to Use Excel Integration for more information.

Project Distributions H Project Distributions V Use this page to Add Distributions to a Project. To access this page: Click Information Steward Accelerator > Project Summary in the Navigation pane. Click Distributionsfor a project. Field Description DISTRIBUTION Displays the unique name of the Distribution, used to group users and Quality Dimensions in a project. If no Distributions exist for the project they must be added before any other work can occur in ISA.

Project Quality Dimension Rules Use this page to Add Rules Using Quality Dimensions. To access this page: Click Information Steward Accelerator > Project Summary in Navigation pane. Click Distributionsfor a project. Click Quality Dimensionsfor a Distribution. Click Rule Count for a Quality Dimensionto see all the rules currently assigned to the project-Quality Dimension combination. Field Description Add Click to add the rule to the Project Distribution.

Project Quality Dimensions Use this page to View Quality Dimensions by Project. To access this page: Click Information Steward Accelerator > Project Summaryin Navigation pane. Click Distributionsfor a project. Click Quality Dimensionsfor a Distribution. Field Description PROJECT Displays the name of the project added in Information Steward and loaded into ISA. QUALITY DIMENSION Displays the Quality Dimension assigned to the rules in the project.

Project Summary H Project Summary V Use this page to: Update the Scorecard Link Run Rules and Send Workflows On Demand To access this page, select Information Steward Accelerator > Project Summary in the Navigation pane. Project Summary V Use this page to Update the Scorecard Link. Field Description Basic Project Displays the name of the project added in Information Steward and loaded into ISA. Days To Retain Metrics

Report Data Viewer H Report Data Viewer V Use this page to Create a Request in dspComposeâ¢ From the ISA Report Data Viewer Page. To access this page, select Information Steward Accelerator > Report Data Viewerin the Navigation pane. Report Data Viewer ISA V Report Data Viewer ISA H

Rule Binding Detail Use this page to Edit Rule Binding Descriptions, Implication and Recommendation. To access this page: Click Information Steward Accelerator > Project Summary in the Navigation pane. Click the Distributions icon for a project. Click the Rules icon for a distribution. Click the Bindings icon. Click the Rule Binding ID link. Field Description Project ID Displays the project that contains the rule and rule binding.

Rule Binding List Use this page to view a list of rule bindings associated with a project. To access this page: Click Information Steward Accelerator > Project Summaryin the Navigation pane. Click All Rule Bindingsfor a project.

Template (ISA External Request Scenario) H Template (ISA External Request Scenario) V Use this page to Create an External Request Scenario for an Information Steward-initiated Request.To access this page: Select dspCompose > Teamon the Navigation pane. Click Templatesfor a team. Click the ISA External Request Scenariosicon. Â Template (ISA External Request Scenario) V Template (ISA External Request Scenario) H Use this page to Create an External Request Scenario for an Information Steward-initiated Request.
Users Use this page to Configure Workflow Options. To access this page, select Information Steward Accelerator > Configurationfrom Navigation pane.

Workflow H Workflow V Use this page to View a Userâs Workflows. To access this page: Select Information Steward Accelerator > Configuration > Usersin the Navigation pane. Click Workflowsfor a user. Field Description CREATED DATE Displays the date and time the workflow was sent to the user selected on the Users page. Workflows are retained for the number of days set in the Days To Retain History field on the Basic Settings tab on the Parameters page.

Workflow Template Use this page to Create Language-specific Workflow Email Templates. To access this page: Select Information Steward Accelerator > Configuration > Parametersin the Navigation pane. Click the Attachment Settingstab or Summary Settingstab. Click Attachment Workflow Translationor Summary Workflow Translation. Field Description LANGUAGE ID Displays the language used in the workflow email. SUBJECT Displays the subject line of the workflow email.

Workflow Template Detail Use this page to View and Edit All Workflow Templates From One Page. To access this page: Select Information Steward Accelerator > Configuration > Edit Workflow Parametersin the Navigation pane. Click the Templateicon for a template. Field Description SUBJECT Displays the subject line of the workflow email. BODY Displays the body of the workflow email.
